name: Video Card Arcade
overview:
Amazing value in this 3 in 1 package from Blue Ribbon. Play Poker Royal, Pontoon or High Low and hope Lady Luck is on your side! Another great deal from Blue Ribbon.

Poker Royal - A choice of holding any one of the five cards to deal a winning hand.

21/Pontoon - After seeing the computer's cards, you have to decide whether to stick or twist. Over 21 and you're bust.

High/Low - Try and complete a successful run by picking whether or not the next card is higher or lower. You can change any card if you wish.
